HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Not enough credits to buy highlight.
HE - Highlights: Not enough credits to purchase highlight.

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_You successfully joined to highlight list
HE - Highlights: You have been successfully added to highlight list

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_You are already in highlight list
HE - Highlights: You are already in list of highlighted members

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Configure member level settings who can buy highlight profile
HE - Highlights: These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Allow members to pay using credits to be highlighted

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Add fields that will be shown on highlight profile widgets
HE - Highlights: Below you can add fields that will be displayed in details of users in Higlighted Members widget. The fields are displayed in one-line and separated by commas.

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Configure Profile highlight settings cost and number of days
HE - Highlights: If you have Credits plugin then you can allow your members to pay using credits to be highlighted. Please just set the cost in credits and duration in days, for example, 50 credits to be highlighted 7 days.
Nobody has paid to be highlighted using credits

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Please install or enable Credits plugin. You can buy this plugin
HE - Highlights: To enable this particluar feature you have to install or enable Credits plugin

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Are you sure that you want to delete this user from highlight?
HE - Highlights: Are you sure you want to remove this particular user from list of highlight

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_You can highlight your profile and display your photo and details to whole network.
HE - Highlights: You can highlight your profile and display your photo and details to entire network.

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_Add fields that will be shown on highlight profile widgets
HE - Highlights: Below you can add fields that will be displayed in members details in Higlight Members widget.

HIGHLIGHT_Highlights: HIGHLIGHT_In this category are no tips!

HE - Highlights: Browse members and click on icon to highlight the members. You can remove members from the highlighted members list or edit expiration date for them.
